Uses of Package
xxl.core.cursors.mappers

Packages that use xxl.core.cursors.mappers
xxl.core.cursors.groupers The package xxl.core.cursors.groupers provides miscellaneous implementations of the group operator on cursors. 
xxl.core.cursors.mappers The package xxl.core.cursors.mappers provides miscellaneous implementations of mapping operators on cursors. 
xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.aggregates The package xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.aggregates provides several aggregate functions for nonparametric estimators. 
xxl.core.relational.cursors The package provides a whole algebra of cursors that extends the functionality of the classes cursors. 
xxl.core.spatial.cursors Provides mappers for different type of Point and Rectangle objects as well as several join algorithms: nested loops distance similarity-join for Points, the spatial join algorithm based on space-filling curves proposed by Jack Orenstein, similarity-join algorithm "GESS: Generic External Space Sweep" and hash-based plane sweep for two-dimensional data. 
 

Classes in xxl.core.cursors.mappers used by xxl.core.cursors.groupers
Aggregator
          The aggregator incrementally computes one or even more aggregates for an input iteration.
 

Classes in xxl.core.cursors.mappers used by xxl.core.cursors.mappers
Aggregator
          The aggregator incrementally computes one or even more aggregates for an input iteration.
 

Classes in xxl.core.cursors.mappers used by xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.aggregates
Aggregator
          The aggregator incrementally computes one or even more aggregates for an input iteration.
 

Classes in xxl.core.cursors.mappers used by xxl.core.relational.cursors
Aggregator
          The aggregator incrementally computes one or even more aggregates for an input iteration.
Mapper
          A mapper invokes a given mapping function on an array of input iterations.
 

Classes in xxl.core.cursors.mappers used by xxl.core.spatial.cursors
Aggregator
          The aggregator incrementally computes one or even more aggregates for an input iteration.
